alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake and northwestern Volusia Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Juniper Springs. This storm was nearly stationary and may drift slowly eastward. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pierson, Lake George, Sellers Lake, Astor Park and Alexander Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
